item.title: "There is nothing worse than a sharp image of a fuzzy concept"- Ansel Adams
item.description:
"There is nothing worse than a sharp image of a fuzzy concept"- Ansel Adams

Ansel Adams with some wise words

item.title: Starting with Film Photography
item.description:
Starting with Film Photography

Shooting film photography is described by many as the best way to actually learn about photography. In this instance I believe they are talking about light, which is the most important condition in taking photographs. Without an LCD screen and the ability to machine gun, film does make me slow down and concentrate on not wasting film, which in turn is not wasting money. Learning about light and how to adjust my aperture and shutter speeds based on light condition has made me a better photographer, if your looking to make the jump these are some websites that helped me. And lets be honest we all need motivation and looking at others work only gets me more excited to take more photos.

item.title: What is the best Leica M for you? - Japan Camera Hunter
item.description:
What is the best Leica M for you? - Japan Camera Hunter

Back in 2012 this is one of the articles that helped me decide which Leica was for me. Check it out, filled with great info.

item.title: Leica M262 Review
item.description:
Leica M262 Review

Another fun Kai Leica review, this time with the newly introduced simpler M240 I mean M262. Whatever your opinion of Leica is, we can all love Kai.

item.title: My Favorite Sites For Leica Info
item.description:
My Favorite Sites For Leica Info

When getting into Leica the internet is filled with opinions. Shockingly there are quite a few Leica haters along with those that overly praise the brand. Below I have listed my favorite Leica sites.

item.title: Using a Rangefinder
item.description:
Using a Rangefinder

Craig Semetko describes how to use a rangefinder. If you have not heard of Craig Semetko check out his work at http://www.semetko.com/

item.title: A Day at the L.A. Zoo
item.description:
A Day at the L.A. Zoo

Nothing better than spending time with my family at the zoo. Having a son that loves animals the joy that he has from visiting the zoo is unmatched.

item.title: Santa Monica
item.description:
Santa Monica

Sunny Southern California is a popular tourist destination. I just call it home. Having lived in Los Angeles for virtually my entire life its great to take time and appreciate the fortunate life that I have.

item.title: Liam's 1st Christmas
item.description:
Liam's 1st Christmas

Some of my fondest memories are spending time with my family. My son's first christmas was special for us all and produced some pictures I will look back on for years to come.
